item.title: NoRBERT：使用迁移学习改进需求分类任务
item.description: NoRBERT: Transfer Learning for Requirements Classification Tobias Hey， Jan Keim， Anne Koziolek， Walter F. Tichy Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT) 引用 T. Hey, J. Keim, A. Koziolek and W. F. Tichy, “NoRBERT: Transfer Learning for Requirements Classification,” 2020 IEEE 28th International Requirements Engineering Conference (RE), Zurich, Switzerland, 2020, pp. 169-179, doi: 10.1109/RE48521.2020.00028. 论文

item.title: 大语言模型原理
